title: Bug 120315 - Display property 'none' not taking effect in PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't have the expected effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The issue observed is that when setting the display property of an item to 'none', the label does not disappear in the PDF preview.
EB: In the PDF preview, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the label should disappear. This is the expected behavior.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Preview the document in PDF format.
